title: Sitting on a Fortune
overview: Six contestants answer questions to remain in with a chance of taking away up to £100,000. Players position themselves in a row of seats one behind another, with one wrong answer seeing them relegated to the back of the line and in real danger of leaving with nothing.With the jackpot mounting, there can be only one winner. Who can stay in the hot seat long enough to take away up to £100,000? In this show there really can only be one player left Sitting on a Fortune.
